sentences: See tants on hoo peale püsis kogu elu.
Ta jättis hoo ja lõpetas oma karjääri.
Võistlusvorm on sellel murdmaajahejal tugevalt alla hoob. Vastupidi, see mees tõusis vormi üles.
context: 'hoo' refers to a period or state of being in momentum, often used in the context of sports or activities where performance is at its peak. It can mean that someone is doing well and things are going their way.
